title: Steam Deck gets MASSIVE update that makes MORE games accessible!

# What are your machines specs?
Office Rig:
 * AMD Ryzen 7 1800x
 * MSI Pro Series X370 SLI PLUS
 * AMD RX VEGA 64
 * GSkill Ripjaw V DDR4 8GB x4 (32 GB)
 * Fractal Design Define R9 Case
 * Manjaro GNOME

Living Room Gaming Rig:
 * ASUS X99-E-10G WS
 * Intel Core i7-6900K @ 3.2GHz
 * NVidia Titan X (Pascal)
 * DDR4 Corsair Vengeance RGB 8GB x8 (64GB)

Backup Rig
* System76 Thelio Minor
* AMD Ryzen 5 3400G
* DDR4 16GB RAM
* Zotac Nvidia GTX 970 4GB

Home Server:
 * ASUS M5A78L-M/USB3
 * AMD FX 6300 at 3.5 GHz
 * Nvidia GTX 750 1GB
 * DDR3 20 GB RAM

Funky Choon (a.k.a. The Linux Gamer Theme Song) by Brothers Nylon https://youtu.be/njrIkXpB7oU

00:00 - Intro
00:22 - You need to install this update
00:35 - General updates
01:01 - On screen keyboard improvements
01:21 - Media tab
02:14 - Steam Input updates
02:21 - Mode Shift in Configurator
02:51 - Other misc updates
03:11 - Virtual Menus (radial, touch, and hotbar
03:24 - What are virtual menus
03:52 - Misc changes
04:36 - Real-world Examples
05:38 - Touch Menu Example
06:02 - Hotbar Example
06:43 - One little nitpick
07:52 - Conclusion
